manyan bayanai: Manyan matattun bayanai sun yi girma don sarrafa al'ada
koyon inji: Algorithms wanda ke ba da damar kwamfutoci don koyo daga bayanai
jadawali: Tsarin nodes da gefuna masu haɗin gwiwa
cryptography: Dabarun don amintaccen sadarwa da kariyar bayanai
girgije kwamfuta: Isar da ayyukan kwamfuta akan intanet
basirar wucin gadi: Yana ba da damar injuna don nuna halaye masu hankali
kwamfuta graphics: Ƙirƙirar da sarrafa hotuna da kwamfuta
hul\u0257ar kwamfuta na \u0257an adam: Nazarin yadda mutane ke hulɗa da fasaha
sarrafa harshe na halitta: Computers fahimtar da sarrafa harshen ɗan adam
layi daya kwamfuta: Yin amfani da na'urori masu sarrafawa da yawa lokaci guda don magance matsaloli
rarraba kwamfuta: Yada lissafin ƙididdiga a kan tsarin da yawa akan hanyar sadarwa
software injiniya: Tsarin ƙira, gini, da kiyaye software
tsaron bayanai: Kare tsarin bayanai daga shiga mara izini
ci gaban yanar gizo: Gina da kula da gidajen yanar gizo da aikace-aikacen yanar gizo
ci gaban gaba-gaba: Bangaren masu amfani da gidan yanar gizo suna hulɗa da su
ci gaban baya-baya: Dabarun-gefen uwar garken da sarrafa bayanai na gidan yanar gizo
ci gaban wayar hannu: Ƙirƙirar ƙa'idodi don wayowin komai da ruwan ka da kwamfutar hannu
ilimin kimiyya: Cire ilimi da fahimta daga bayanai
hangen nesa na kwamfuta: Bayar da kwamfutoci don 'gani' da fahimtar bayanan gani
augmented gaskiya: Rufe bayanan dijital zuwa duniyar gaske
zahirin gaskiya: Ƙirƙirar yanayi da aka kwaikwayi na nutsewa
intanet na abubuwa: Cibiyar sadarwa na na'urorin jiki tare da shigar da damar kwamfuta
